actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States permitting the President to grant a pardon to an individual only after such individual has been convicted.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Permits the President to grant a reprieve or a pardon to an individual for an offense only after such individual has been convicted.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States permitting the President to grant a pardon to an individual only after such individual has been convicted.
